backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping preload-related enhancements to ContactPage and index.html with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files including styles, config, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO meta tags, font preconnects, and preload hints for multiple hero images.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up router-driven navigation wrapped in AppLayout and ErrorBoundary with reactive route updates.
frontend/src/components/about/DividerFea: Renders a list of feature items separated by visual dividers.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamMember: Responsive team member row showing placeholder image and text content with optional reversed layout.
frontend/src/components/common/NumberTic: Animated number counter using IntersectionObserver and a custom hook to start counting when visible.
frontend/src/components/common/PageTrans: Applies fade or fade-slide transitions to page content, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/common/RevealOnS: Mount-based reveal animation wrapper with subtle or noticeable variants and optional delay.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: Provides a dropdown accordion for selecting a legal service with validation styling and state-managed open/close behavior.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Error boundary component displaying a styled fallback UI with reload option when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with contact info, social links, and homepage hash-navigation logic for smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: Renders an about section with firm overview, approach highlights, and a button navigating to the About page.
Displays an interactive FAQ accordion and injects JSON-LD schema for SEO.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: Shows a call-to-action section prompting users to schedule a consultation, linking to the contact page.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Implements a looping background image carousel with preloading and a button to navigate or scroll to the contact form.
Creates a responsive navbar with scroll detection, in-page section navigation, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Displays a timeline outlining the firmâ€™s legal process steps using a reusable timeline component.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersMar: Displays a horizontally scrolling marquee of partner cards with duplicated data for seamless looping.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Renders the partners section with a header and includes the PartnersMarquee using static partner data.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Shows a grid of legal services with icons and navigation buttons to services and contact pages.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Implements an auto-scrolling testimonial carousel with manual navigation and responsive snap-based scrolling.
Wraps the testimonials section with a header and embeds the TestimonialsCarousel using predefined testimonials.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Displays trust indicators with icons and animated number counters in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the app layout with navbar, page transition, and scroll restoration logic on route or hash changes.
frontend/src/components/reui/timeline.ts: Re-exports a customizable timeline component system with context, items, indicators, and separators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity loading states. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes status flags and identity data.
frontend/src/hooks/useNumberTicker.ts: Animates a number from 0 to a target value using an easing function when visible. Resets when hidden and manages animation frames.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadImages.ts: Preloads a list of image URLs and tracks when the first and all images are ready. Returns loading state and counters.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing actor and fetch state from useActor for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, typography, utility classes, and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with a hero image, firm values, team members, and features, preloading the hero image.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form with validation, submission simulation, and a hero image preload; includes service selection and feedback states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage from several content sections with scroll-based reveal animations and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a styled 404 page with an alert icon and a button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports a list of service definitions including names, icons, and descriptions for use in the Services page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with a hero section, practice areas grid from servicesData, and scroll reveal effects.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Implements a simple client-side router with route registration, navigation, and subscription for path changes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme settings, colors, fonts, layout options, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project status and requirements related to fixing the grey flash issue on the Contact Us page hero image.
